00033 namespace Hyperspace {
00034 
00035   using namespace Hypertable;
00036 
00037   class Session;
00038 
00039   class ClientConnectionHandler : public DispatchHandler {
00040   public:
00041 
00042     enum { DISCONNECTED, CONNECTING, HANDSHAKING, CONNECTED };
00043 
00044     ClientConnectionHandler(Comm *comm, Session *session, time_t timeout);
00045     virtual ~ClientConnectionHandler();
00046 
00047     virtual void handle(Hypertable::EventPtr &event_ptr);
00048 
00049     void set_session_id(uint64_t id) { m_session_id = id; }
00050 
00051     bool disconnected() {
00052       boost::mutex::scoped_lock lock(m_mutex);
00053       return m_state == DISCONNECTED;
00054     }
00055 
00056     int initiate_connection(struct sockaddr_in &addr) {
00057       boost::mutex::scoped_lock lock(m_mutex);
00058       DispatchHandlerPtr dhp(this);
00059       int error;
00060       m_state = CONNECTING;
00061       if ((error = m_comm->connect(addr, dhp)) != Error::OK) {
00062         std::string str;
00063         HT_ERRORF("Problem establishing TCP connection with Hyperspace.Master at %s - %s",
00064                      InetAddr::string_format(str, addr), Error::get_text(error));
00065         m_comm->close_socket(addr);
00066         m_state = DISCONNECTED;
00067       }
00068       return error;
00069     }
00070 
00071     void set_verbose_mode(bool verbose) { m_verbose = verbose; }
00072 
00073     void close() {
00074       boost::mutex::scoped_lock lock(m_mutex);
00075       m_comm->close_socket(m_master_addr);
00076       m_state = DISCONNECTED;
00077     }
00078 
00079   private:
00080     boost::mutex m_mutex;
00081     Comm *m_comm;
00082     Session *m_session;
00083     uint64_t m_session_id;
00084     int m_state;
00085     bool m_verbose;
00086     struct sockaddr_in m_master_addr;
00087     time_t m_timeout;
00088   };
00089   typedef boost::intrusive_ptr<ClientConnectionHandler> ClientConnectionHandlerPtr;
00090 
00091 
00092 }
